title: 12 Pack Cheesecloth Table Runner, 10ft Rustic Sheer Runner Gauze Tablecloth Boho Wedding Decor Romantic Table Runner for Wedding Bridal Shower Birthday Party(35" x 118") (Terracotta)
descriptions:
Elevate your special events with our 12 Pack Cheesecloth Table Runner! Made from premium quality polyester, these 10ft runners are soft to touch, durable, and comfortable. The lightweight and skin-friendly material ensures a pleasant experience for all your guests.

Each pack contains 12 pieces of rustic sheer gauze table runners, measuring 35 inches in width and 118 inches in length. The versatile size fits most tables, making them perfect for various occasions such as weddings, bridal showers, birthday parties, holiday parties, and more. They also serve as excellent decorative pieces for restaurants and hotels.

The multi-purpose design allows you to use these runners as chair cover sashes, decorative napkins, or even for gift wrapping. With easy care instructions, you can reuse them multiple times. Simply hand wash or machine wash on a gentle cycle with cold water and mild detergent. Remember to avoid using hot water and ironing to maintain their quality.

Experience the perfect blend of rustic charm and romantic elegance with our Terracotta colored table runners. Enhance your event decor and create lasting memories with this must-have wedding decor item. Don't hesitate to contact us for any questions or assistance. Elevate your decor game with our 12 Pack Cheesecloth Table Runner today!
